Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 45th overall pick, by Houston in 1989...
Injured on 6/22/1990 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1992, off Mike Timlin (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/15/1992, off Ben McDonald (PIT)...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1994 (Going to HOU: P R. Clemens, LF G. Vaughn, 2B M. McGwire. Going to CHC: 1B J. Thome, RF J. Gonzalez, RF R. Greer, P D. Wells, C E. Wedge)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/18/1994...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 2/5/1995 (Going to NYM: C E. Wedge. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF B. Hunter)...
